department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2023-07-05 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply, delivery and set-up/installation of a variety of fitness equipment, as described in the Requirement in Annex Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
### Fitness Equipment Procurement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), has **(request for proposal)**[1] for the supply, delivery, and installation of fitness equipment.

#### Important Tender Details:

* **Tender Title** : W0125-23WR22 SOL B Fitness Equipment
* **Notice Type** : Request for Proposal [1]
* **Procurement Method** : Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria** : Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements** : Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Tender Specification:

* The tender is available at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16175773](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16175773)
* The procurement is for the supply, delivery, and installation of a variety of fitness equipment
* The requirement is described in the **Requirement in Annex Statement of Requirement**

#### Tender Timeline:

* **Publication Date** : 2023-05-04
* **Tender Closing Date** : 2023-07-05T14:00:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : 2023-08-01
* **Expected Contract End Date** : None

#### Contact Information:

* **Contact Name**: Alexa Fraser (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

[1]: Tender notice type refers to Request for Proposal - a procurement method where suppliers are invited to propose solutions to a specific requirement. The proposals are then evaluated to determine the best solution.

#### Important Notes:
The closing time for the tender has been amended. All required documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on 2023-07-05 by 14:00 EDT. Bids submitted after the deadline will be declared non-responsive. Please disregard the altered Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell posting responses.
